title: Looking for Duo partner
body: Hey folks! I'm a gold 2 sup main. Looking for a consistent player or 2 to dynamic que with. I'm looking to hit plat this season but find that there is only so much I can do as a sup when i consistently get unfortunate match ups in other lanes. So if you're a good player, a smurf, or someone who is just climbing back to where you were last season. Add me IGN: Loony Russian.

replies.body:
when say smurfs can add you to but i get insta deleted on my  smurf

feelsbadman
